name: Kayla Crowley
title: Budtender/Receptionist
coverLetter: Since moving to California in March, I have started to gain a lot of knowledge about this industry. Since my roommate has very bad anxiety, he has been prescribed a medical ID and through him I have learned a lot about the different strains and the effects these strains have. I am a very fast learner and have a lot of prior experience as a receptionist. I am very friendly, with a very strong work ethic and excellent customer service skills and I think I would be a perfect addition to your team!
experience:
rA Organic Spa Burbank,CA

Front Desk Receptionist/Administrative Assistant              October 2017 - Present

  • Work as desk greeter. Check in guests, give tour of spa, check out guests.
  • Collect payment from clients and make sure they are satisfied with services.
  • Answer phones and emails, take messages, schedule appointments.
  • Thank you emails sent out and confirmation calls made daily.
  • If a problem arises (ex. schedule, employee calls out, etc), fix as accurately and as quickly as possible.
  • Continuously counting revenue throughout the day to make sure computer totals are correct with on hand amount.
  • Run reports at end of month, week and day and send reports to owners.
  • Train new employees on the computer system and daily work tasks.


OUBeauty Medical Spa, Glendale, CA

Front Desk Receptionist/Administrative Assistant      April 2017 - November 2017

  • Work as a desk greeter while promptly answer phone calls, schedule appointments and taking messages as needed.
  • Greet patients and escort to the proper area.
  • Keep track of patients and shoppers whereabouts at all times.
  • Responsible for checking patients in and out, collect payment and adhere to patients and nurses needs.
  • Assist in training new employees.
  • Responsible for counting daily revenue at the end of the night.
  • Call patients for appointment reminders and leave messages when needed.
  • Staying complaint with HIPAA Laws.


Beach Bum Tanning & Airbrush, Patchogue, NY                                                      

  Store Manager        April 2015 – March 2017

  • Promoted to Store Manager within months of working as a regular associate.
  • Responsible for scheduling all hourly associates’ calendars.
  • Handled all hiring and firing of store employees.
  • Contact maintenance or hire management when building repairs are needed
  • In charge of training new/current employees on computer system updates.
  • Pull daily, weekly, and monthly averages and sales reports for total store.
  • Manage daily task lists for employees and ensure they are executed.
  • Track inventory for store and keep an up-to-date order list for supplies.
  • Work as the desk greeter/sales person to ensure customer has a pleasant experience.
  • Responsible for counting total weekly sales and transporting to main office.
  • Airbrush Technician responsible for airbrushing clients when needed.
  • Directly responsible for customer satisfaction through every transaction.


Rite Aid Pharmacy, West Islip, NY                                                                                  

Pharmacy Technician          May. 2013 – Jan. 2015

  • Worked as both Technician as well as cashier.
  • Managed prescriptions to be compliant with HIPAA Laws.
  • Responsible for inputting prescription needs into system to be filled.
  • Communicated with insurance companies and clients to ensure proper filling of prescriptions.
additionalInfo:
• 22 years of age
  • Reliable transportation to and from work
  • Flexible schedule
  • Able to work long hours
  • Friendly, Trustworthy and Helpful
